channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- Album Lock
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- Album Lock

item.title: CVE-2017-20102|2024-08-05T21:45:25.776Z -- unspecified -- album%20lock
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Album Lock 4.0 and classified as critical. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /getImage. The manipulation of the argument filePaht leads to path traversal. Attacking locally is a requirement. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
